title: Who Is Malaki Starks’ Fiancée? Savanna Jackson’s Relationship History
description: Football player Malaki Starks and his fiancée, Savanna Jackson, flaunted elegance in their recent April 2025 Instagram post following their October 2024 engagement. The NFL star and Jackson met over a decade ago and have been friends ever since. Who is Malaki Starks’ fiancée? Malaki Starks is engaged to Savanna Jackson, whom he met when […] The post Who Is Malaki Starks’ Fiancée? Savanna Jackson’s Relationship History appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Arpita Adhya
excerpt: Ravens standout Malaki Starks and fiancée Savanna Jackson have been "best friends" since childhood and got engaged in 2024.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Football player Malaki Starks and his fiancée, Savanna Jackson, flaunted elegance in their recent April 2025 Instagram post following their October 2024 engagement. The NFL star and Jackson met over a decade ago and have been friends ever since. Who is Malaki Starks’ fiancée? Malaki Starks is engaged to Savanna Jackson, whom he met when he was in fourth grade. The couple got engaged on October 25th, 2024, after dating for around four years. Malaki Starks and Savanna Jackson’s relationship history Malaki Starks and Savanna Jackson met when they were kids and eventually chose each other as life partners around a decade later. After announcing their engagement last year, the 21-year-old NFL star revealed in a press conference that he has been “best friends” with Jackson since their first meeting in fourth grade. Starks revealed, “We have been together for about four years. So, it’s been something I’ve thought about for a while. I knew that I wanted to spend my life with her. So I thought, why not?” The Ravens player added that it was Jackson’s birthday, so he set it up to make Jackson’s birthday extra special. The athlete gushed, “She is very special to me, and she’s very important to what I do.” Starks revealed that “it was just time” to take the big step, as their families also knew each other. The former Georgia Bulldogs player also celebrated the special event on Instagram with his 69k followers. Starks shared a touching caption for his future wife, writing, “Oct 25th—stamped. Beyond blessed to be on this journey with you forever and always.” Meanwhile, Starks started his college football career with the Georgia Bulldogs. He declared for the NFL Draft in January 2025. The Baltimore Ravens selected him with the 27th overall pick on April 24, 2025, adding the defensive standout to their roster.
html:
Football player Malaki Starks and his fiancée, Savanna Jackson, flaunted elegance in their recent April 2025 Instagram post following their October 2024 engagement. The NFL star and Jackson met over a decade ago and have been friends ever since.

Who is Malaki Starks’ fiancée?

Malaki Starks is engaged to Savanna Jackson, whom he met when he was in fourth grade. The couple got engaged on October 25th, 2024, after dating for around four years.

Malaki Starks and Savanna Jackson’s relationship history

Malaki Starks and Savanna Jackson met when they were kids and eventually chose each other as life partners around a decade later. After announcing their engagement last year, the 21-year-old NFL star revealed in a press conference that he has been “best friends” with Jackson since their first meeting in fourth grade.

Starks revealed, “We have been together for about four years. So, it’s been something I’ve thought about for a while. I knew that I wanted to spend my life with her. So I thought, why not?”

The Ravens player added that it was Jackson’s birthday, so he set it up to make Jackson’s birthday extra special. The athlete gushed, “She is very special to me, and she’s very important to what I do.” Starks revealed that “it was just time” to take the big step, as their families also knew each other.

The former Georgia Bulldogs player also celebrated the special event on Instagram with his 69k followers. Starks shared a touching caption for his future wife, writing, “Oct 25th—stamped. Beyond blessed to be on this journey with you forever and always.”

Meanwhile, Starks started his college football career with the Georgia Bulldogs. He declared for the NFL Draft in January 2025. The Baltimore Ravens selected him with the 27th overall pick on April 24, 2025, adding the defensive standout to their roster.
